Manage information shared on <linkAdsMan: Manage information shared on <linkAdsManager>Pinterest Ads Manager </linkAdsManager>
Uses hashed information that your custom: Uses hashed information that your customers have already provided to your business to help match more of your website visitors and conversions to people on Pinterest. Enabling it may improve the performance of your campaigns and can help increase the size of your Pinterest tag audiences.
Matches conversion data with the person: Matches conversion data with the person responsible for the conversion and lets you track cross-device checkouts. Requires Track Conversion option to be enabled. <link>See more</link>
Adds a \u2018Save\u2019 button on images: Adds a ‘Save’ button on images allowing customers to save things straight from your website to Pinterest.
Automatically create and update rich pin: Automatically create and update rich pins on Pinterest for posts.
Automatically create and update rich pins on Pinterest for all synced products.
Gather analytics for Pins you publish an: Gather analytics for Pins you publish and Pins that users create from your site.
Rich Pins are a type of organic Pin that: A Rich Pin is a type of organic Pin that automatically syncs information from your website to your Pins. You can identify Rich Pins by the extra information above and below the image in close-up and the bold title in your feed. If something changes on the original website, the Rich Pin is updated to reflect that change.
